summary: Comprehensive testing of EV Charging Transaction Management app - Iteration 2. All new features tested: Chargers CRUD, Reports with charts, OCPP Remote Control, Navigation. Backend: 19/19 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows working correctly.
passed_tests: Login flow with admin@evcharge.com / admin123
Dashboard statistics display (Total Transactions, Energy, Revenue, Paid/Unpaid)
Chargers page - GET all chargers
Chargers page - CREATE charger with CCS2/CHADEMO connectors
Chargers page - UPDATE charger status and power
Chargers page - DELETE charger
Reports page - Generate report with no filters
Reports page - Generate report with payment status filter
Reports page - Bar charts (Revenue by Account, Energy by Account)
Reports page - Pie charts (Revenue by Connector Type, Revenue by Payment Method)
Reports page - Summary cards and tables
OCPP page - Status endpoint (active transactions, boots, version 1.6)
OCPP page - Remote Control section with Start Charging button
OCPP page - Start Charging modal with ID Tag input
OCPP page - Remote Start/Stop transaction flow
OCPP page - Active Charging Sessions table
Transactions page - List with PAID/UNPAID status
Transactions page - Invoice download for paid transactions (API verified)
Transactions page - Bulk payment update functionality
Navigation - All sidebar links working (Dashboard, Transactions, Import, Chargers, Pricing, Reports, OCPP, Users)
seed_data_creation: Test chargers created and cleaned up during testing

mocked_apis.OCPP 1.6: OCPP WebSocket real-time protocol is SIMULATED via REST endpoints (/api/ocpp/remote-start, /api/ocpp/remote-stop). Not a full OCPP 1.6 WebSocket implementation.

context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Chargers CRUD, Reports with CSS-based charts (bar and pie), OCPP Remote Control with Start/Stop buttons, Transactions with bulk payment update and invoice download. Special accounts (PORTERIA, Jorge Iluminacion, John Iluminacion) have connector-based pricing. Currency is Colombian Pesos (COP).
